snippet: South Korea’s security would not be improved by developing its own nuclear weapons.
abstract: Editorial pushes back on suggestion made by some influential South Koreans that country should develop its own nuclear arsenal in order to answer North Korea's nuclear weapons; warns that creation of South Korean nuclear weapons would inflame situation, not calm it.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s security would not be improved by developing its own nuclear weapons.

headline.seo: No Nukes on the Korean Peninsula
headline.main: No Nukes on the Korean Peninsula
headline.print_headline: No Nukes on the Korean Peninsula
